problem_text_cn: 如图,已知圆锥的底面半径为6,母线长为10,则此圆锥的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is N_0, and the length of the generatrix is ​​N_1, then the lateral area of ​​the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:底面周长是:2×6π=12π,则圆锥的侧面积是:\frac{1}{2}×12π×10=60π．故选:A．
